sourcesContent:
<mat-card class="card1">
    <app-events-read></app-events-read>
</mat-card>
<mat-grid-list cols="4" rowHeight="100px">
  <mat-grid-tile
      *ngFor="let tile of tiles"
      [colspan]="tile.cols"
      [rowspan]="tile.rows"
      [style.background]="tile.color">
    {{tile.text}}
  </mat-grid-tile>
</mat-grid-list>
